metadata.title: CVE-2024-29509 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Artifex Ghostscript before 10.03.0 has a heap-based overflow whenPDFPassword (e.g., for runpdf) has a \000 byte in the middle.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-29509` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.3
libgs-common - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.3
libgs10 - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.3
libgs10-common - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.3').
